001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.io.PrintStream;
004import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
005import java.util.Objects;
006import java.util.function.Supplier;
007
008import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
009
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.RainbowGumVersion;
011
012/**
013 * Logging about logging. Currently not really public API.
014 *
015 * @author agentgt
016 * @hidden
017 */
018@SuppressWarnings("InvalidBlockTag")
019public final class MetaLog {
020
021        private MetaLog() {
022        }
023
024        /**
025         * Logs an error in the logging system.
026         * @param event event to log.
027         */
028        public static void error(LogEvent event) {
029                FailsafeAppender.INSTANCE.log(event);
030        }
031
032        /**
033         * Logs an error in the logging system.
034         * @param loggerName derived from class.
035         * @param throwable error to log.
036         */
037        public static void error(Class<?> loggerName, Throwable throwable) {
038                String m = Objects.requireNonNullElse(throwable.getMessage(), "exception");
039                error(loggerName, m, throwable);
040        }
041
042        /**
043         * Logs an error in the logging system.
044         * @param loggerName derived from class.
045         * @param message error message.
046         * @param throwable error to log.
047         */
048        public static void error(Class<?> loggerName, String message, Throwable throwable) {
049                var event = LogEvent.of(Level.ERROR, loggerName.getName(), message, throwable);
050                error(event);
051        }
052
053        /**
054         * Resolves the Rainbow Gum documentation URL based on static version information.
055         * @return URL <strong>with no trailing slash!</strong>
056         */
057        public static String documentBaseUrl() {
058                String version = RainbowGumVersion.VERSION;
059                if (version.endsWith("-SNAPSHOT")) {
060                        return "https://jstach.io/rainbowgum";
061                }
062                return "https://jstach.io/doc/rainbowgum/" + version + "/apidocs";
063
064        }
065
066        static Supplier<? extends @Nullable PrintStream> output = () -> System.err;
067
068}
069
070enum FailsafeAppender implements LogEventLogger {
071
072        INSTANCE;
073
074        @Override
075        public void log(LogEvent event) {
076                if (event.level().compareTo(Level.ERROR) >= 0) {
077                        var err = MetaLog.output.get();
078                        if (err != null) {
079                                err.append("[ERROR] - RAINBOW_GUM ");
080                                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
081                                event.formattedMessage(sb);
082                                err.append(sb.toString());
083
084                                var throwable = event.throwableOrNull();
085                                if (throwable != null) {
086                                        err.append(" ");
087                                        throwable.printStackTrace(err);
088                                }
089                        }
090                }
091        }
092
093}
